alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Clarke; Monroe (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 3:19PM CDT until July 28 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Monroe County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... South central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 319 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles west of McCullough, or 19 miles southeast of Jackson, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Monroe, northwestern Baldwin and south central Clarke Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
